summary: This is an email notification from a claims management service (ClaimFox) to Ghislaine Maxwell, informing her that requested records related to a claim are available for pickup and that an invoice is due. It appears to be administrative correspondence regarding a claim or records request.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the named claimant and recipient of this email notification regarding the availability of requested records and an invoice for payment.

events.title: Records Request Completion Notification
events.description: An email is sent to Ghislaine Maxwell notifying her that requested records related to a claim are available for pickup and that an invoice is now due.

keyFacts: On July 9, 2020, Ghislaine Maxwell received an email notification that requested records related to a claim were available for pickup.
The notification included an invoice (number 42561447) that was due for payment.
The correspondence is related to a specific claim (Claim #40897182) with a 'Date Of Loss' referenced but not specified in the provided text.
